HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2-3 working days. Up to 8 working days for islands.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to islands takes longer (up to 8 working days), but no monetary surcharge is mentioned.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery and delivery to parcel lockers (paketomati) within Croatia.
PROVIDERS: The exclusive provider for home delivery is GLS. The provider for parcel lockers is not specified.
PRICING: Home delivery costs 3,99€ for orders under 80€ and is free for orders of 80€ or more. Delivery to parcel lockers is always free. Cash on delivery is an option, but no surcharge is mentioned.
DELIVERY TIMES & RESTRICTIONS: Standard home delivery takes 2-3 working days. Delivery to Croatian islands can take up to 8 working days. No other specific restrictions or surcharges for islands are mentioned. Weekend and express delivery are not available.
NOTABLE FEATURES: A key feature is the completely free delivery to parcel lockers, regardless of order value. The free shipping threshold for home delivery is 80€.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is not on a dedicated page but is integrated within the 'Uvjeti kupnje' (Terms of Purchase) page. The information is reasonably clear but requires searching through a long legal document. Key details, such as the parcel locker provider, are missing. There is no mention of in-store pickup, parcel shops, or bulky item delivery.
